contest-event.event-date: Nov. 3, 1973 D National Mineworkers (Championship Section) National Mineworkers (Championship Section) 1 Test Piece Contest National Mineworkers Contest national-mineworkers-championship-section This contest became the Butlins Mineworkers Contest in 2003. Championship A Moorside Suite Winter Gardens (Empress Ballroom), Blackpool, Lancashire, England, UK Creswell Colliery not shown in programme. 12 bands competed. 12th annual contest. Feb. 6, 2011, 8:53 p.m. Oct. 19, 2015, 10:27 a.m. 1 Grimethorpe Colliery Band Howard Snell 2 Desford Colliery Band Ernest Woodhouse 3 Carlton Main Frickley Colliery Band Robert Oughton 4 Parc and Dare Band Ieuan Morgan 5 Thoresby Colliery William Lippeatt 6 Longannet Colliery (Cowdenbeath) Enoch Jackson Unknown Result BHK (UK) Horden Band W.
